entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
